page.title: 08A Factory Worker.
page.content: I work night-shift at Marley Tiles from 8p.m until 4a.m.There are certain jobs which must be done every night in order for the factory to run the following day.The most important of these jobs is in the{Batching Plant.} This is where the sand and cement are mixed to make the tiles.The finished mix is called{Pug.}The pug is mixed in a large pan shaped mixer.Inside the mixer pan is a device called a{Spider. This consits of zinc steel arms .There are steel paddles attactched to three of these arms and the other three hold a steel bracket to which are fixed three steel fingers called{Tines.} When the pug is being mixed it builds up on the tines and paddles and it is my job to make sure these are cleaned for the following day.My average wage is Â£85 per week.
